text: Ukku Banda Wanninayake (23 November 1905 - 21 August 1973) was a Ceylonese politician. He was born in Kurunegala on 23 November 1905. He was educated at S. Thomas' College, Mount Lavinia. == References == Category:1905 births Category:1973 deaths Category:Sri Lankan politicians
title: U. B. Wanninayake
